title: Whispers Of Deceit
description: Final Major Project for my degree, it's a multiplayer game where players explore a haunted mansion, solve puzzles, and figure out who the traitor is.

modal.detailedDescription:
This was my first time doing networked multiplayer programming in Unreal Engine, and it was a great learning experience.

The game features a unique 'Haunt' feature where the gameplay would change depending on certain factors, and this system would set up the second stage of the game based on a randomly selected 'Haunt'.

**Contributions**
- Inventory System
- Combat System
- Interaction system
- Custom "Haunt" mechanic.
- Automated builds with Jenkins
- Network Programming

title: The Adventures of Sprig and Gizmo
description: Split-Screen 3D platformer where players have to solve puzzles and work together to progress through the game.

modal.detailedDescription:
My first time working with Unreal Engine and it was a great learning experience.

At first it was challenging learning all these new systems but I am proud of the work I did and the mechanics I was able to implement.

**Contributions**
- Object grabbing mechanic that the player used to grab puzzle items to move around.
- Interaction system for the items and puzzles
- Built a puzzle manager to track puzzle state.
- Organized source control and wrote ceremony docs.

title: The Invention of Beebo
description: The Invention of Beebo is a Mega Man Clone, in which you play as a robot dog and their trusty drone!

modal.detailedDescription:
This was my first time working with a large team and it taught me a lot about managing a software project and how to work with others.

I was responsible for the implementation of the level mechanics, as well as the player character's movement and abilities.

**Contributions**
- Level Design
- Player Character Movement
- Player Abilities
- Level Mechanics
- Organized source control and wrote ceremony docs.

title: Knight Game
description: A 2D game where you play as a knight and have to defeat enemies and collect items.

modal.detailedDescription:
This was a 2D game project where I explored Unity's particle system and deepened my understanding of core programming concepts. I implemented item pickups, managed player states, and polished the feel of gameplay through visual feedback and effects.

**Contributions**
- Implemented particle effects for actions and feedback
- Created a responsive pickup system
- Gained experience with Unity's event-driven systems
- Improved understanding of clean code structure and reusability

title: Untitled Unity Game
description:
This was my first published game on Itch.io.
It's a 2D top down adventure game where you basically just kill a few enemies on the island you are on.

title: Spaceshipts N'Rocks
description: Made in a PS4 Devkit, it's a simple 2D game where you control a spaceship and try to kill enemy ships.

modal.detailedDescription:
This project was an exploration of game development on the PS4 platform. It involved creating a simple 2D game where players control a spaceship and engage in combat with enemy ships.

Because I had to sign a Sony NDA I am not allowed to show the source code.

**Contributions**
- Developed a basic game loop and mechanics
- Implemented player controls and enemy AI
- Learned about PS4 development environment and constraints

title: DirectX Mini Engine
description: Built with DirectX 11, this is a mini game engine that I created to learn more about graphics programming.

modal.detailedDescription:
This project was a deep dive into graphics programming, where I implemented a mini game engine using DirectX 11. It involved creating a rendering pipeline, handling shaders, and managing resources efficiently.

**Contributions**
- Developed a custom rendering pipeline
- UI system with panels
- Implemented basic collision detection
- Created a simple scene management system
- Learned about DirectX 11's architecture and capabilities

title: Collision System Demo
description: This project demonstrates a decoupled, modular and abstract collision sub-system made with SDL.

modal.detailedDescription:
This project showcases a collision system designed to be modular and decoupled from the main game logic. It allows for easy integration into various game projects and supports multiple collision shapes.

**Contributions**
- Developed a modular collision system
- Implemented various collision shapes (AABB, Circle, Polygon)
- Focused on performance and flexibility

title: Minecraft Skin Tool
description: This is a tool I'm working on to provide users with a good workflow...

modal.detailedDescription:
This tool is designed to streamline the process of creating and editing Minecraft skins. It provides a user-friendly interface for skin manipulation, allowing users to easily customize their characters.

**Contributions**
- Developed a skin editor with real-time preview
- Implemented features for importing and exporting skins
- File watcher system to update skin changes in real-time

title: Rot & Roll
description:
Micro Game Jam 041 entry. Theme was platforms and indirect control.
How fast can you roll to the finish line?

modal.detailedDescription:
You play as a rolling apple and you need to climb up the side of a building to the finish line. 
 How fast cant you get there?

title: Dust and Departure
description: Global Game Jam 2025 entry. The theme was bubbles so we made a game where you had a bubble gun that you could use to create bubbles that would jump on.

modal.detailedDescription:
This game was created for the Global Game Jam 2025 with the theme of 'Bubbles'. The team came together to create a unique platforming experience where players use a bubble gun to create bubbles that serve as platforms to navigate through levels.

**Contributions**
- Developed the bubble gun mechanics
- Implemented bubble physics and interactions

title: Jelly Xperiment
description: Solent Game Jam 2023 entry. You play as a jelly creature that can expand and contract to solve puzzles and navigate through levels.

modal.detailedDescription:
This game was created for the Solent Game Jam 2023. The concept revolves around a jelly-like creature that can change its size to interact with the environment and solve puzzles.

**Contributions**
- Main Menu
- Pause Menu
- Scene Management system

title: Untitled Rage Platformer
description:
Solent Welcome Week 2024.
A 2D platformer where levels were the player had to navigate the levels that were purposely designed to be frustrating and difficult.

title: One Rule
description:
Unity Game Jam 2022 entry.
Basic rythm game themed around the idea of e-waste and recycling.

modal.detailedDescription:
This game was created for the Unity Game Jam 2022. The theme was 'One Rule', and we interpreted it as a rhythm game where players must follow a single rule to progress through levels.

**Contributions**
- UI Programming
- Scene Management System
